channel.title: CVE Feed for gregross -- Auto iFrame
channel.description: The latest CVEs for gregross -- Auto iFrame

item.title: CVE-2024-9449|2024-10-09T13:28:01.693Z -- gregross -- auto%20iframe
item.description: The Auto iFrame plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'tag' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
